title: still dishonorable after two months
body: I got banned in September for a week. Ive been on my best behaviour since but for some reason I cant get out of honour level 0. I havent been reported and have been getting honoured alot but still no change. My level was locked for like 2 weeks after the ban but then it got unlocked. I think my account is permanently stuck. Can you please help me.

replies.body: i have this same problem i've been stuck at dishonorable for like a month now i got a notification saying well done for improving my behavior and still stuck at honor level 0
So what can we do about this?

Went ahead and checked your account, and it seems you're definitely doing a much better job since your Honor dropped back in September!

I'm still seeing a few cases where your chat's a little abrasive, and that is slowing you down. Fortunately though, your Honor is now unlocked and is progressing at a steady rate. Work to keep your behavior as positive as you can and cooperate with your team, and you should soon see your Honor grow. :)
what about my honor can you check why mine is still stuck at level 0 even though i got a message saying i was doing much better in my games with not leaving ect
